experiences.position: DevOps Engineer at BUOPSO Pvt Ltd
bullets: Enhanced Security Infrastructure: Implemented Vault for secure key management and configured a Web Application Firewall (WAF) to strengthen application security.
Optimized Observability: Established efficient log backup procedures using Prometheus and Loki, and integrated Grafana for real-time monitoring and analysis.
Streamlined Development Workflow: Set up GitLab to facilitate collaboration and version control within the development team.
Deployment of AI models using a combination of technologies, including GitHub, GitHub Actions, Docker, Azure Kubernetes Service and Jenkins.
Utilized Azure services, including Blob Storage, for efficient data storage and management of model outputs, ensuring data integrity and availability.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Jenkins, streamlining the deployment process for AI models.
Set up monitoring solutions using Azure Prometheus and Grafana, providing real-time insights into model performance and system health.
